item.title: VLC 播放器
item.description: Hotkeys During playback you can press g or h to adjust subtitle delay (adjust step is 50 ms). OS X v2.2.1 keys: “h” (decrease delay, subtitles display after sound) and “j” (increase delay, subtitles display before sound).
